site_tagline: We strive to give the best in providing information and advice for Japanese companies who seek business opportunity and expansion in Indonesia.
site_description: PT. SBCS Indonesia is a member of Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group (SMFG) engaged in business consulting, providing services for new and potential Japanese investors. We strive to give the best in providing information and advice for Japanese companies who seek business opportunity and expansion in Indonesia. Our services include consultation (business strategy and industrial study), business matching, legal and advisory.
